title.rendered: H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama and the Hon Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, Amb. Zubairu Dada to a farewell reception held in the Ministry

content.rendered:
Following the successful completion of their tenure, the YOUWIN Connecthosted the Hon. Minister of Foreign Affairs, H.E. Geoffrey Onyeama and the Hon Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, Amb. Zubairu Dada to a farewell reception held in the Ministry on 25/5/2023.
Distinguished guests at the occasion included the Directors-General NIA, DTCA, Members of the Diplomatic Corps among other dignitaries. Also present were members of staff of the Ministry.
